delete_member_days.description: number of days after which inactive members were kicked

members_removed.description: number of members removed by the prune

channel_id.description: channel in which the entities were targeted

message_id.description: id of the message that was targeted

count.description: number of entities that were targeted

type.description: type of overwritten entity - "0" for "role" or "1" for "member"

role_name.description: name of the role if type is "0" (not present if type is "1")
